context.description: Unique identifier of the source dataset.

megdp_platform_rec_timestamp.description: Date the batch was added to MEG.

business_date.description: The logical business date of the data. Also reporting date.

mis_system.description: The MIS source system. Either EC or Holmes.

finance_pnl_usd.description: The P&L amount from the Finance MIS system.

raw_constructed_pnl_usd.description: The front office component of the constructed hypo P&L.

fx_reval_usd.description: The FX reval component of the constructed hpyo P&L.

adjustment_usd.description: The adjustment component of the constructed hpyo P&L.

finance_vs_constructed_variance_usd.description: The adjustment component of the constructed hpyo P&L.

_test_note.description: Meta attribute used to describe this data in relation to testing.

primary_key.name: pk_hpl_consistency_checker
primary_key.fields: context, megdp_platform_rec_timestamp, business_date, mis_system, cost_center_id, pnl_attribute
